summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4289 for the improvement of East 42nd Street, from 48th Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, gravelling and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50952, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
